title: excluding or appending to facet buckets
description:
Two other JIRA issues (SOLR-10576, SOLR-10577) are about restricting the buckets of a field facet by regex, or by explicitly listing the values.  But there are other ways one may want to modify the list of which buckets may be returned.


	exclude a set of buckets by regex
	always include a specific set of buckets, even if they don't make the normal top-N
